column4: hey guys! I am having problem with NFS,  I've got a Ubuntu Server installation where i run NFS server. I have one Ubuntu Client where I would like to make the mount.... I've got mount.nfs: internal error, as error message
are portmapper, lockd, and statd running?
made a ps aux | grep portmapper on the serverside
How are you attempting to mount the NFS export?
sudo mount -t nfs -o proto=tcp,port=2049 matthews.dyndns.biz:/var/www/reklambladet /mnt/www/         or         sudo mount -t nfs matthews.dyndns.biz:/var/www/reklambladet /mnt/www
sudo mount -t nfs -o proto=tcp,port=2049 matthews.dyndns.biz:/var/www/reklambladet /mnt/www/         or         sudo mount -t nfs matthews.dyndns.biz:/var/www/reklambladet /mnt/www
sry mate, thought you didnt notice the first msg.
Do you have shell access to the NFS server?
Check for any server-side errors or log message while I'm pretending to find out what the real problem is.
I will reboot the client once aswell
